snippet.title: Johnny Depp called Amber Heard a 'c***' who ruined his 'cool life' in text rant
snippet.description: ced his ex Amber Heard a "c***" and said she ruined his "cool life" in an explosive text message.   Depp sent the message to friend and neighbour Isaac Baruch following his split from the actress.  The message was revealed today during Depp's libel hearing against The Sun at London's High Court.  Depp was angry that he was about to lose the five LA penthouses he owned.  The luxury apartments were  on one floor. Depp and Heard lived in one and Mr Baruch, who has been friends with Depp for 40 years, told the court he lived in another rent free.    The texts read: "I hate it but I've got to lose those f***ing   penthouses  .   "That c*** ruined such a f***ing cool life we led for a while. I can't even look at the building anymore.   "F * ***d up. I rey loved that spot."   The High Court heard the text was sent from Depp to Mr Baruch in October 2016, following his split from Heard.   Sasha Wass, QC for The Sun, asked if Depp was referring to Heard when he said "that c***".   Mr Baruch la ...
